TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BevelBitmapEffect extends System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect
Public NotInheritable Class BevelBitmapEffect Inherits BitmapEffect

summary.span: **注意：這個 API 現在已經淘汰。**
非過時的替代方式是 。
建立斜面，它會根據指定的曲線抬高影像表面。

span.span: Creates a bevel which raises the surface of the image according to a specified curve.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 已軟體呈現點陣圖效果。 bitmap effects are software rendered. 套用效果的任何物件也會在軟體中轉譯。Any object that applies an effect will also be rendered in software. 不應該將點陣圖效果套用至大型的視覺效果或動畫，因為這可能會降低效能。Bitmap effects should not be applied to large visuals or animations as this can degrade performance. 斜面 （斜面的曲線） 的類型由決定屬性。The type of bevel (bevel curve) is determined by the property. 是數種效果 SDK 隨附的其中一個。 is one of several effects that are shipped with the SDK. 其他的影響包括：Other effects include: - - - - 下圖顯示套用至視覺物件 (在此情況下套用至)。The following illustration shows a applied to a visual object (in this case applied to a ). ![螢幕擷取畫面： 比較正常和經過斜面化的按鈕](~/add/media/effects-bevelsimple1.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 比較正常和經過斜面化的按鈕")![Screenshot: Compare normal and bevelled buttons](~/add/media/effects-bevelsimple1.png "Screenshot: Compare normal and bevelled buttons") 下圖顯示的數個基本屬性的效果。The following illustrations show the effect of several basic properties of . 屬性會指定斜面的寬度為：The property specifies how wide the bevel is: ![螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 BevelWidth 值](~/add/media/effects-bevelbevelwidth.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 BevelWidth 值")![Screenshot: Compare BevelWidth values](~/add/media/effects-bevelbevelwidth.png "Screenshot: Compare BevelWidth values") 屬性會指定斜面的曲線：The property specifies the curve of the bevel: ![螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 EdgeProfile 的](~/add/media/effects-beveledgeprofile.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 EdgeProfile 的值")![Screenshot: Compare values of EdgeProfile](~/add/media/effects-beveledgeprofile.png "Screenshot: Compare values of EdgeProfile") 屬性會指定斜面浮雕的：The property specifies the relief of the bevel: ![螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 relief 屬性](~/add/media/effects-bevelrelief.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 relief 屬性")![Screenshot: Compare relief properties](~/add/media/effects-bevelrelief.png "Screenshot: Compare relief properties") 屬性會指定斜面陰影平滑度：The property specifies how smooth the shadows of the bevel are: ![螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 Smoothness 屬性值](~/add/media/effects-bevelsmoothness.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 Smoothness 屬性值")![Screenshot: Compare Smoothness property values](~/add/media/effects-bevelsmoothness.png "Screenshot: Compare Smoothness property values") 屬性指定的方向從 「 虛擬光源 」 來自用以建立斜面的陰影：The property specifies from which direction the "virtual light" is coming from that creates the shadows of the bevel: ![螢幕擷取畫面： 比較燈光角度](~/add/media/effects-bevellightangle.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 比較燈光角度")![Screenshot: Compare light angles](~/add/media/effects-bevellightangle.png "Screenshot: Compare light angles")

span.span: for creating an instance of the class.

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.

summary.span: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

returns.span: 目前物件的可修改複本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使來源的 屬性為 ，複製物件的 屬性將仍為 。

span.span: The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double LightAngle { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: **注意：這個 API 現在已經淘汰。**
非過時的替代方式是 。
取得或設定「虛擬光源」的方向，用以建立斜面的陰影。

span.span: Gets or sets the direction the "virtual light" is coming from that creates the shadows of the bevel.
The direction of the virtual light source.

value.span: 有效範圍是 0-360 (度)，0 指定物件的右邊，後續值會沿著物件以逆時針方向移動。

span.span: The valid range is from 0-360 (degrees) with 0 specifying the right-hand side of the object and successive values moving counter-clockwise around the object.

value.span: 斜面的陰影是光源投射的相反邊。

span.span: The shadows of the bevel are on the opposite side of where the light is cast.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下圖顯示淺色方向來自指定這個屬性的值。The following diagram shows what direction light comes from for a given value of this property. 斜面的陰影是光源角度相對的一邊轉換。Shadows of the bevel are cast on the opposite side from the light angle. ![圖表： DropShadow 方向](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowdirection2.png "圖表： DropShadow 方向")![Diagram: DropShadow direction](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowdirection2.png "Diagram: DropShadow direction") 下圖示範這個屬性的效果：The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property: ![螢幕擷取畫面： 比較燈光角度](~/add/media/effects-bevellightangle.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 比較燈光角度")![Screenshot: Compare light angles](~/add/media/effects-bevellightangle.png "Screenshot: Compare light angles") ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

Public Shared ReadOnly LightAngleProperty As DependencyProperty

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Relief { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: **注意：這個 API 現在已經淘汰。**
非過時的替代方式是 。
取得或設定斜面浮雕的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the relief of the bevel.
The height of the relief of the bevel.

value.span: 有效範圍是介於0和1與1的浮雕最多 （最暗陰影）。

span.span: The valid range is between 0 and 1 with 1 having the most relief (darkest shadows).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下圖示範這個屬性的效果：The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property: ![螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 relief 屬性](~/add/media/effects-bevelrelief.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 relief 屬性")![Screenshot: Compare relief properties](~/add/media/effects-bevelrelief.png "Screenshot: Compare relief properties") ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Smoothness { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: **注意：這個 API 現在已經淘汰。**
非過時的替代方式是 。
取得或設定斜面陰影平滑度。

span.span: Gets or sets how smooth the shadows of the bevel are.

value.span: 指出斜面陰影平滑度的值。

span.span: Value indicating how smooth the bevel shadows are.

value.span: 有效範圍是介於0和1與1代表最平滑。

span.span: The valid range is between 0 and 1 with 1 being the smoothest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下圖示範這個屬性的效果：The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property: ![螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 Smoothness 屬性值](~/add/media/effects-bevelsmoothness.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 比較 Smoothness 屬性值")![Screenshot: Compare Smoothness property values](~/add/media/effects-bevelsmoothness.png "Screenshot: Compare Smoothness property values") ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
